rules.main: Move {ally} to the closest position to get the {enemy} in line of sight without being blocked by {obstacles}.

builder.placing: Click on a cell to place the {type}
builder.puzzleCopyFailure: Unable to copy the encoded puzzle!

index.title: Dofus Puzzles
index.description: Dofus Puzzles trains your tactical positioning: find the best move to place an enemy in your line of sight.

builder.title: Dofus Puzzles: Create Your Puzzle
builder.description: Create your own Dofus puzzle and add it to GitHub so everyone can play it.
